com.androidquery.util
Class XmlDom

java.lang.Object
  com.androidquery.util.XmlDom

public class XmlDom
extends java.lang.Object

Specialized class for simple and easy XML parsing. Designed to be used in basic Android API 4+ runtime without any dependency. There's no support to modify the dom object. The toString method return a string that represents the xml content. WARNING: The toString methods are for debugging only and do not guarantee a proper XML transformation.

tag

public XmlDom tag(java.lang.String tag,
                  java.lang.String attr,
                  java.lang.String value)
Return a node that represents the first matched tag. If value == null, node that has the attr are considered a match. A dummy node is returned if none found.

Parameters:
tag - tag name
attr - attr name to match
value - attr value to match
Returns:
the xml dom

tags

public java.util.List<XmlDom> tags(java.lang.String tag,
                                   java.lang.String attr,
                                   java.lang.String value)
Return a list of nodes that represents the matched tags that has attribute attr=value. If attr == null, any tag with specified name matches. If value == null, any nodes that has the attr matches.

Parameters:
tag - tag name
attr - attr name to match
value - attr value to match
Returns:
the list of xml dom
See Also:
testTags2

public java.lang.String text(java.lang.String tag)
